Privacy Message:
By clicking on continue you agree to share the following: 

 - Name, address and age  
 - Contact Information 
 - Previous health history and conditions 
 - Current health conditions and statistics 

 to your residential supervisors/your nurses and their supervisors and the developers.
 The developers DOES NOT AND WILL NOT use your personal info for purposes other than the purposes required by this app. 
 If you agree and wish to proceed, please tap on 'Agree' and then tap 'Continue'. Thank you!
Director intro description: Only choose this if you are the organizer of an SRO, hospital, or care center. This identity is strictly for identities who oversees managers.
Manager intro description: Only choose this if you are the manager of an SRO, hospital, or care center. This identity is strictly for identities who manage the tenants or patients
Resident intro description: Only choose this if you are a tenant of an SRO or a patient at a care center or a hospital.

Service not found msg: Needed service not found, disconnect and attempt again, or connect to another device.
Suitable characteristic not found msg: disconnect and attempt again, or connect to another device.
Low battery, please charge your device.
Bad measurement msg: Bad measurement, please close this dialog, adjust placement of armband and try to measure your temperature again.
Please check your wifi connection and tr: Please check your wifi connection and try again.
Delete msg: Delete this measurement in cloud? If you think there is an error in this measurement, please press Yes and measure again.
History icon: This is the history icon, you can tap this to see your historical temperature trends.
Thermometer icon: This is the thermometer icon, you can tap this icon to measure your current temperature.
Primary tag explanation:
These are the primary tags that represent your current health condition: 

Black - ill. 
Gray - potentially ill, or under recovery. 
White - healthy
Secondary tag explanation:
These are the secondary tags that represent your current temperature: 

Red - fever. 
Green - normal 
Blue - hypothermia
Options icon:
This is options icon, you can tap this icon to:

 Change Mode - this changes the temperature taking mode to be constant monitoring mode, which monitors your temperature constantly. Press the starts button to start monitoring, stop button to stop monitoring.

Disconnect - disconnect from current device and connect to a new device. 

Delete - deletes the current temperature measurement from record. 

Change Unit Preference - changes the unit you view your temperature in, if you are on fahrenheit, it will swap to celsius and vice versa.
Individuals Tab description:
In the individuals tab, you can see the health information of the individual. Each individual is represented by a tile with the their temperature in the middle, name on top, and condition is represented by a tag following this color code:

Black - ill. 
Gray - potentially ill, or under recovery. 
White - healthy

Their temperature is displayed with colors following this color code:

Red - fever. 
Green - normal 
Blue - hypothermia

Tap on the individual tile to see the individual's information in detail
Search icon description: This is the search icon, you can tap this icon to search for specific unit or individual.
Remind icon description: This is the remind icon, you can tap this icon to see all individuals that had not taken a temperature measurement in the last 12 hours, so that you can remind them.
View icon(individual): This is the view icon, you can tap this icon to sort the individuals/units by their health condition.
Change Unit Preference Button descriptio: This is the Change Unit Preference button, it changes the unit you view your temperature in, if you are on fahrenheit, it will swap to celsius and vice versa.
Refresh Icon: Pull down page to refresh data. Please remember to do so before viewing a specific individual.
Director View Description: In the director view, you can see all the managers under your responsibility. Each manager is represented by a tile with the manager name on the top and number of residents under the specific manager's responsibility. Tap on the manager tile to see all the units under the manager's responsibility
View icon(manager): This is the view icon, you can tap this icon to see all managers.
Units Tab description:
In the units tab, you can see all the units under your responsibility. Each unit is represented by a tile with the unit name in the middle and its condition is represented by its color:

Black - ill. 
Gray - potentially ill, or under recovery. 
White - healthy

Tap on the unit tile to see all the individuals in the unit

Meet developer msg:
Feel free to message us anything about this app! If you found it a bug please email us about it, providing a thorough description and if you can attach a screenshot or screen recording of the bug. Thank you! 

 You can email us by clicking on their email addresses or compose a SMS by tapping on our phone numbers. 
 
If you are not comfortable with English, you can also message or email us in your preferred language!
Sorry, please navigate to link using the: Sorry, please navigate to link using the default browser of your device.
There are no measurements or not enough: There are no measurements or not enough measurements taken in the selected time window.
